recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

detailed_profile.name: Pranjal Parihar
detailed_profile.position: LinkedIn Top Voice | Structured Solutions - Kotak Private | Capital Account Transaction | MBA (IB) IIFT & Hanken School of Economics
detailed_profile.about: A banker with almost a decade of dynamic, cross-functional experience, I specialize in transaction banking, International trade, M&A, MNC banking, FEMA transactions, and strategic solutions for businesses across industries and actively working with Law firms, Consultancies and CAs in structuring cross border M&A deals and Complex transactions. My journey began with IDFC First Bank, where I contributed to its foundational growth, setting the stage for my passion for impactful banking solutions. At ICICI Bank, I was a founding member of the Capital Account Transactions team, where I worked on complex FEMA transactions and structured deals in Mumbai, the country's largest market. This role allowed me to scale the business significantly and build a robust network of intermediaries and stakeholders. In my recent role with HSBC, I led Transaction Banking for startups and MNCs in Delhi NCR, crafting tailored solutions for one of the most dynamic verticals in the banking ecosystem. Currently, as part of the Structured Solutions team at Kotak Private, I collaborate with law firms, consultants, private equity players, and other ecosystem partners to navigate cross-border and M&A transaction structuring, along with providing bespoke banking solutions to Pan-India clients. I thrive in strategically challenging environments and believe in blending technical acumen with a personal touch to foster enduring relationships. My education in International Business and global exposure, including a defining exchange program in Helsinki, have equipped me with a nuanced understanding of multiple industries and cross-border business intricacies. Beyond banking, I am a passionate sportsperson, having represented my teams in Karate, Basketball, and Cricket at various levels. A devoted Lakers and Arsenal fan, I find inspiration both on the court and the pitch. Traveling, exploring new cultures, and connecting with diverse people are my sources of rejuvenation, while writing provides me with an avenue to reflect and share insights. Feel free to check out my blog, where I delve into banking-related topics: https://ifintale.wordpress.com/category/banking/. If you're seeking a partner who deeply understands startups, FEMA regulations, and tailored banking solutions across industries, I’d love to connect and explore how I can help you achieve your business objectives. Disclaimer: Views expressed here are my personal opinions and not endorsements.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

recommendations: Malay Matalia “I recommend Mr. Ram Rastogi for his exceptional contributions as a board member. His hands-on approach and profound expertise in the payments space is invaluable, providing strategic direction and insights. His ability to blend strategic vision with practical solutions has made a noticeable impact on our operations. His extensive network and deep understanding of banking and FinTech dynamics greatly enhance our strategic capabilities. His involvement would be a significant asset to any team he is a part of.”

Babu Nair “I am delighted to recommend Ram Rastogi for his outstanding contributions and expertise in the realm of payments and banking. Ram is a true embodiment of dedication, knowledge sharing, and ecosystem building, which have collectively shaped his formidable brand in the industry. Ram's profound understanding of payments, coupled with his visionary insights into the business of banking, sets him apart as a thought leader of immense caliber. What truly stands out is his ability to articulate complex concepts with simplicity, maintaining a humble demeanor despite being a treasury of insights in the payments and banking domain. Having witnessed his impact not only in India but also globally, I can attest to Ram's exceptional engagements with regulators, bankers, payment companies, and technologists. His mentorship has been instrumental in nurturing several promising fintech ventures, a testament to his commitment to fostering innovation and growth. My journey with Ram commenced during our interactions at NPCI, where his keen observation, exceptional teaching skills, and innate ability to forge valuable connections became evident. Ram's unwavering support and insightful guidance have been invaluable to me, reflecting his role as a dependable friend and an indispensable networker. I wholeheartedly endorse Ram to any organization, whether global or Indian, seeking comprehensive perspectives on the payments and banking landscape. His ability to provide both macro and micro insights makes him an indispensable asset for any consulting assignment in this space. In summary, Ram Rastogi's unparalleled expertise, coupled with his genuine passion for driving positive change, makes him a truly exceptional professional in the field of payments and banking. It is with great confidence that I recommend him for any endeavor seeking excellence and profound understanding in this dynamic industry.”

projects.title: Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
projects.description: It is an improvised version of IMPS on messaging platform ISO 20020 with various add an facility like Tokenisation ( Virtual Address ) , Pull Transactions , Device Finger Printing as a 3rd Factor of Authenitication , e-mandate and Invoice in a Box.

projects.title: National Unified USSD Platform (NUUP)
projects.description: National Unified USDD Platform (NUUP) :NUUP is another service innovations of NPCI dedicated to the Nation by our Prime Minister , Mr. Narendra Modi on 28th August 2014 , as a common mobile banking platform on USSD channel for offering basic banking services including real time ,24*7 remittance service-IMPS to 75 million+ account holders being opened under ,”Prime Minister ‘s Jan Dhan Yojana” (PMJDY) in the remotest part of the country. This project is envisaged as one of largest Financial Inclusion undertaken in the world. NUUP has eventually established connectivity with all Telcos and have a common USSD short code *99#. All customers of participating banks/PPIs can just dial *99# and get an interactive menu of respective banks/PPIs or common menu depending on the NPCI arrangement with bank/PPIs ) to complete basic banking transactions. Given that USSD alleviates the need for application download and is more secure than SMS , this is set to revolutionise and democratise the mobile based remittance/payments in India and larger sections of the Indian population across the country would benefit from that.

projects.title: Immediate Payment Service (IMPS)-Unleashing Power of One Billion Consumers in India
projects.description: IMPS ( Immediate Payment Service ) is a 24X7, real time, cost effective, channel independent ,ubiquitous payment platform , known to be the best grounded innovation in payment technologies with visionary architecture, facilitating integration and inter-operability between customers of 71 leading banks and 8 telco led mobile wallets -m-Pesa, Airtel Money , m-Rupee and other non-telco led wallets like Oxicash, G Cash, ITZ Cash etc. in India.By bringing Telcos to the IMPS platform, NPCI has created yet another grounded service innovation — ‘co-creation’. This entails the collaborative model that allows large section of unbanked population to reap the benefit of direct benefit transfers in a very cost effective manner.IMPS is getting wide acceptance in India in remittances , merchant payments in semi urban and rural areas where POS terminals are not cost effective and cash management services of corporates too.World’s largest Financial Inclusion Program –PMJDY - Jan Dhan Yojana of Government of India rides of USSD based B2C payment platform –NUUP of NPCI.In terms of numbers, from one million transactions a month in September 2013, IMPS traversed a long way with a 6 x+ growth in last 12 months , crossing another milestone of 6.50 million transactions last month. Set to touch many other milestones in days to come!

organizations.title: BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT FEDERATION OF INDIA (BCFI)
organizations.description: Business Correspondent Federation of India (BCFI) is an association of 60+ Corporate BC (CBC) members at national level, servicing through over 2 million Customer Service Points (CSPs) in remotest corner of Bharat. BCFI came into being with the intent of promoting responsible finance by the delivery of services to the not so privileged masses through the critical last mile route.Over past two years, while continuing to serve bank customers, CSPs were exposed to huge risk of pandemic. Despite this risk, in these difficult times, the services in last miles have continued unhindered and the BCs have been recognized by Department of Financial Services as COVID Warriors. Governor RBI and Finance Minister made positive announcements in media about the role of BCs in such difficult times.BCFI is a not-for-profit organisation . Advisor to the Board of BCFI is an honorary position. https://bcfi.org.in/

organizations.title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment
organizations.description: FinTech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) is a not-for-profit organisation to voice the common concerns of Consumer Lending FinTech companies with regulators, media, listing or distribution platforms (like Google Play Store) and other external stakeholders.The association, which got registered in September 2020, comprises of industry leaders in the FinTech Lending space, and looks to be the bridge between the lending entities & consumers on one hand, and banks/NBFCs, regulatory bodies, government, media houses & listing platforms on the other. The members of FACE comprise of the founders of the leading Indian digital lending platforms KreditBee, EarlySalary, Kissht, CashE, and LoanTap.Chairman -Governance Council at FACE is an honorary position.

detailed_profile.about: Project Manager with experience across the defense, chemical, petrochemical, and energy sectors. Currently focused on leading strategic and operational initiatives in the defense industry, managing and optimizing explosives production with a strong emphasis on safety, regulatory compliance, and process efficiency. Previously led sustainability-driven projects, including chemical recycling ♻️, waste-to-energy solutions, and renewable energy. Skilled in overseeing complex projects from R&D to execution, bringing a cross-sectoral perspective to industrial innovation and production. Experienced in team coordination, stakeholder communication, and delivering projects on time and within budget. Holding an M.Sc. in Applied Physics and pursuing a Ph.D. in chemical recycling ♻️ and alternative plastic fuels. Committed to leveraging technical expertise and project management skills to drive sustainable innovations.
